CustomField.description: 101 will create a STD CERT: If customization is required, the Customer will select from the existing layouts or a new layout will be created The ID# will be used to designate the specific content and sequence the content on the CERT will be generated in.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 101 will create a STD CERT: If customization is required, the Customer will select from the existing layouts or a new layout will be created The ID# will be used to designate the specific content and sequence the content on the CERT will be generated in.
CustomField.label: Content/Layout #1
